context_bundle.summary: Setting up open source projects for community contribution
context_bundle.content:
Open source project essentials.

Required Files:
- README.md - Project overview, quick start
- CONTRIBUTING.md - How to contribute
- CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md - Community standards
- LICENSE - Legal terms (MIT, Apache, GPL)
- CHANGELOG.md - Version history

GitHub Setup:
- Issue templates (bug, feature, question)
- PR template with checklist
- Branch protection rules
- GitHub Actions for CI

Community:
- Discord/Slack for discussions
- Good first issues for newcomers
- Documentation site (Docusaurus, GitBook)
